views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10, 11 and 12

It works on iPhones, iPods and iPads.

ClearClockView is my new Tweak that gives you the visual option to make Clear and Smoother the Icon of the Clock's App.

Testers: Lorenzo Noide (la Capra), SunnyTM, KSM, Halston Altman and iKilledAppl3. Thanks so much Guys!

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Enable/Disable options from Settings.

(In the Screenshot with all the Names of the Icons hidden, you can use the Tweak ByeFolderName for that sleeker Effect).

Version 1.6 - Added Support Compatibility for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12 Devices. - Code Improves and Cleanup. Version 1.4
- Added the option to Disable the Feature to Swipe to Delete on Clock Application.
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate me (thanks) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Added the Label to Check Other Tweaks by Me on BigBoss Repo.
Version 0.0.1-2
- Added full iOS 10 Compatibility.
- Small Change in Settings.
